channel.title: Snippets section
channel.description:
It's been suggested MANY times before.
But, lets face it, the snippets thread is cluttered, full of spam, and it's rarely used.
A snippet section section would be a good addition to the forum.

item.title: Snippets section
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

There is actually a topic suggesting something similar to this in discussion currently. So, for that reason, I’ll just lock this since there’s no point in having two topics suggesting the same thing basically. Keep an eye on this section in case it is made public.

Read full topic
